purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the data that identify and describe a program of work.
This edition incorporates modifications to the previous edition listed below.

The following MIM EXPRESS declarations have been added:
Modifications made to the mapping specification of the following entity definitions (changed):

inscope.li: definition of a project, of its responsible organization and of its planned and actual execution dates;
association of a project to activity and product data;

description.p: The Project UoF specifies the data structure for the representation of the concept of program of work.
